## API FINANCIAMENTO

Python, Flask

#### Tabela de Financiamento SAC

Método: POST

http://127.0.0.1:5000/financiamentos/sac

- Request

```json
{
  "valor_financiado": "100000",
  "taxa_juros_ano": "8.4",
  "numero_parcela": "200"
}
```

Status Code: 200 OK

#### Tabela de Financiamento PRICE
Método: POST

http://127.0.0.1:5000/financiamentos/price

Request

```json
{
	"valor_financiado": "100000",
	"taxa_juros_ano": "8.4",
	"numero_parcela": "200"
}
```

Status Code: 200 OK

Response
```json
{
```
